The first generation benchamrk
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Raising/Training Tips: The first generation benchamrk
By Farmer Jimbo on Saturday, May 20, 2000 - 08:32 am:

This is an archive post. It is not intended to be a “method” or training regime for your monster. It is simply how I raised my second Mariomax using the best techniques and tricks I know. Like my first Mariomax, this is a first generation Golem straight off the Bob Dylan’s greatest hits CD. The goal here is to achieve the highest overall point total.

Unless otherwise noted, the Monster is assumed to be even in raising style, normal in weight, and Bad in nature. This monster was raised on a ranch that has all the stable and house upgrades including the hot springs. Items in inventory throughout the monsters life are: 3xGemini Pot, Artemis Statue, Lump of Ice, Fire Stone, Dino Tail, and Heel Badge. When the date skips forward a couple of weeks, it is assumed that Bruce was put in the freezer and another monster went to the ranch. I’ll continue to tack on more posts, time allowing.

Bruce, Mariomax (Golem/Wracky) 0.0 Years old
Likes Tablets, Dislikes Potato, Even, Normal, Worst

Lif-92, Pow-150, Int-103, Ski-68, Spd-83, Def-131

Nov 4th, Candy, Run (Fail, Scold), Tablet, Dec 1st, Mint, Shoot (2)
Dec 4th, Nuts Oil, Rest, Tablet, Jan 1st, Paradoxine, Run (3)
Jan 4th, Mint, Study (1, Cheat, Scold, Worst), Tablet, Feb 1st, Nuts Oil, Study (2)
Feb 4th, Mint, Domino (4), Tablet,

Lif-95, Pow-274, Int-106, Ski-190, Spd-54, Def-88

Mar 4th, Mint, Rest, Tablet, Apr 1st, Paradoxine, Run (3)
Apr 4th, Nuts Oil, Study (2), Tablet, May 1st, Mint, Shoot (3)
May 4th, Nuts Oil, Run (2), Tablet,

Lif-100, Pow-394, Int-108, Ski-313, Spd-37, Def-59

Jun 4th, Mint, Rest, Tablet, Jul 1st, Paradoxine, Shoot (3)
Jul 4th, Mint, Run (3), Tablet, Aug 1st, Nuts Oil, Study (2)
Aug 4th, Mint, Run (1, Cheat, Scold, Worst), Tablet,

Lif-104, Pow-514, Int-110, Ski-436, Spd-26, Def-41

Sep 4th, Mint, Rest, Tablet, Oct 1st, Paradoxine, Study (4)
Oct 4th, Mint, Run (4), Tablet, Nov 1st, Nuts Oil, Study (3)
Nov 4th, Mint, Run (1, Cheat, Scold, Bad), Tablet,

Lif-109, Pow-634, Int-117, Ski-556, Spd-18, Def-28

Dec 4th, Candy, Rest, Tablet, Jan 1st, Mango, Endure (11, Great, Praise)
Jan 2nd, Mint, Dodge (4),

Jan 3rd through Mar 3rd, Errantry monster picks up two more Paradoxines,

Mar 4th, Mint, Meditate (9,2,-3), Tablet, April 1st, Nuts Oil, Rest
April 4th, Paradoxine, Run (5), Tablet,
May 4th, Mint, Study (4), Tablet, Jun 1st, Nuts Oil, Run (5)
Jun 4th, Mint, Study (4), Tablet,

Lif-119, Pow-754, Int-134, Ski-678, Spd-16, Def-25

One more dose of Paradoxine to go! I’ll finish off Stage 1 sometime this weekend or on Monday.

1.0.0 Years Old, Still Stage 1,

Jun 4th, Mint, Endure (5), Tablet, Jul 1st, Nuts Oil, Study (6)

****END OF STAGE ONE****

1.2.1 Years Old, 2509 total points

Lif-146, Pow-871, Int-165, Ski-804, Spd-23, Def-50
